name: tvheadend
description: Tvheadend is a self-hosted TV streaming server and recorder for DVB, ATSC, IPTV and more. It offers channel management, EPG, recording rules, and streaming to clients via an integrated web interface.
features: Live TV streaming: Stream live TV from DVB, ATSC, IPTV, or other sources to network clients.
Recording: Schedule and record TV programs with series recording and conflict resolution.
EPG support: Display electronic program guides from various sources for easy program browsing.
Multi-tuner: Support multiple TV tuners simultaneously for watching and recording different channels.
Transcoding: Transcode streams on-the-fly for compatibility with different devices and bandwidth.
Web interface: Manage channels, recordings, and settings through a comprehensive web interface.
Client support: Stream to various clients including Kodi, VLC, and mobile apps.
Channel management: Scan, organize, and configure TV channels with custom numbering and grouping.
Recording rules: Set up complex recording rules based on title, genre, or other criteria.
Timeshift: Pause and rewind live TV with timeshift buffer functionality.
User management: Support multiple users with individual channel access and recording permissions.
DVR functionality: Full-featured DVR with series recording, conflict management, and storage management.
